ModMetaData.name: Storybook
ModMetaData.author: Krush
ModMetaData.description:
Requires: CommunityCoreLibrary
Adds some more child/adult backstories to the game.
Child backstories: - Bully - Farm kid - Fat kid - Medieval witch - Military cadet - Miner kid - Officer cadet - Pet sitter - Runaway - Sandbox architect - Super hero - Tester - Vatgrown engineer - Vatgrown slave - Young reader
Adult backstories: - Jack of all trades - Junior officer - Medical soldier - Mercenary lieutenant - Military scout - Musician - Police officer - Police sergeant - Politician - Professional builder - Professional farmer - Professional miner - Senior officer - Starship bioengineer - Starship cook - Starship engineer - Starship guard - Starship nurse - Starship pilot - Super soldier - Veteran marine - Video game blogger
Stories by Provider: - Andouce (child: Military cadet)(adult: Military scout, Medical soldier, Mercenary lieutenant, Police officer, Police sergeant, Politician, Senior officer, Veteran marine) - Igabod (child: Farm kid, Miner kid, Sandbox architect)(adult: Professional builder, Professional farmer, Professional miner) - mokonasakura (child: Medieval witch - Super hero
- Jack of all trades - Musician - Starship guard - Super soldier
